patthana16.94:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana16.94:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
